page.title: 07Waterfall Knitwear
page.content: This is a small company started 8 years ago in a coverted mill by Jo Rawlinson who has a degree in Fashion and Textiles, experience in the textile industry and the teaching of Knitwear Design. They produce knitwear all of original design. Originally this was combined with the running of hand and machine knitting courses. 8 People are employed using knitting mahines at home. All finishing is done at the mill by Jo Rawlinson or under her supervision. Some sweater are made to traditional type patterns using Welsh wool. In others muted shades of mohair are used. The main range in 1985 is of bright colours with motifs of lollipops, icecream cones etc. These are highly fashionable now but always popular are sweaters with animal motifs.
